name: Creepypasta Land
storyline: In Creepypasta Land, we can be either a boy or a girl and we can even give the character a name. The protagonist moves with his mother to Crelles Town and lives in a large house. There the protagonist ends up meeting with several creepypastas monsters and must survive them all.
summary: Creepypasta Land, is a survival horror and psychological horror style horror game, made in the RPG Maker VX Ace. The game was created by Lucas Boato, a Brazilian. This page will try to explain about the game avoiding spoilers, the disclosure of spoilers in the comments is prohibited. In Creepypasta Land, we can be either a boy or a girl and we can even give the character a name. The protagonist moves with his mother to Crelles Town and lives in a large house. There the protagonist ends up meeting with several creepypastas monsters and must survive them all.
